data.comment: The match is underway in Saransk.
Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
In the minute 1, Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to Sochi's area.
In the minute 2, Sochi needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
In Saransk Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian is caught offside.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 5, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi pushes forward through Nikita Burmistrov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Sochi throw-in in Tambov's half.
In the minute 9, Sochi drive upfield and Nikita Burmistrov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tambov defender.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 13, Anton Zabolotnyi's header is off-target for Sochi.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Tambov a goal kick.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 15, Sochi's Timofey Margasov gets in a shot on goal at Mordovia Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In Saransk, Nikita Burmistrov (Sochi) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 16, Tambov have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Goal kick for Tambov at Mordovia Arena.
In the minute 21, Kirill Zaika of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Sochi.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anton Zabolotnyi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sochi.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 27, Tambov surge into the attack at Mordovia Arena but Vladimir Obukhovâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Sochi are coming forward and Joaozinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 33, Tambov have a goal kick.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi drives towards goal at Mordovia Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for Tambov in Saransk.
Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Sochi at Mordovia Arena.
Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 41, Joaozinho (Sochi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saransk.
In the minute 45, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to Sochi's area.
Tambov are pushing forward but Vladimir Obukhov's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Saransk.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Tambov at Mordovia Arena.
In the minute 46, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Anton Kilin is on a sub for Oleksandr Kaplienko for Tambov.
In the minute 46, Tambov make their second substitution with Kirill Panchenko replacing Vladimir Obukhov.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a first substitution, with Ivelin Popov replacing Anton Zabolotnyi.
Mikhail Kostyukov of Tambov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Sochi.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Tambov.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Sochi throw-in in Tambov's half.
In Saransk a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Tambov at Mordovia Arena.
Important block from the Sochi defence as Aleksey Rybin fires in a strike for Tambov.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Tambov are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Free kick Sochi.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Tambov have a goal kick.
The match at Mordovia Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Valeriu Ciuperca, who is down injured.
The home team has substituted Valeriu Ciuperca with Pavel Karasev. Sergey Pervushin is thus making his third change.
In the minute 61, Tambov to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Sochi.
Throw-in Sochi.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 62, Timofey Margasov is booked for the away team.
Tambov's Kirill Panchenko breaks free at Mordovia Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Sochi at Mordovia Arena.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Sochi.
In the minute 67, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ivelin Popov for Sochi who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The home team have replaced Aleksandre Karapetian with German Onugha. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Saransk.
In the minute 69, Sochi to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In Saransk a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Ivan Miladinovic (Sochi) has replaced the possibly injured Ivelin Popov at Mordovia Arena.
In the minute 74, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Throw-in for Tambov at Mordovia Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Free kick Tambov.
Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Anton Kilin for Tambov gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saransk.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
In the minute 78, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the away team a throw-in.
Sergey Pervushin is making the team's fifth substitution at Mordovia Arena with Evgeni Shlyakov replacing Mikhail Kostyukov.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
German Onugha (Tambov) has received a yellow card from Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Sochi throw-in in Tambov's half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Tambov's area.
In the minute 81, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Sochi throw-in in Tambov's half.
Elmir Nabiullin is replacing Kirill Zaika for Sochi at Mordovia Arena.
The away team replace Miha Mevlja with Aleksandr Rudenko.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Sochi in the half of Tambov.
Sochi's Aleksandr Rudenko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 86, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Sochi.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 89, Tambov's German Onugha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sochi at Mordovia Arena.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
Tambov drives forward and Kirill Panchenko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tambov's Kirill Panchenko breaks free at Mordovia Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saransk.
The match has come to a close in Saransk. The final score is 0-1.
Christian Noboa is on target to give Sochi a 0-1 advantage.
Elmir Nabiullin with an assist there.
Tambov's Adessoye Oyewole has been booked in Saransk.
Ivan Novoseltsev is replacing Christian Noboa for the away team.
